name: Ending In Solace
description: This is a game I made for a college class I am taking so it is my first game and it isn't the best but for those of you that look into it I hope you enjoy! This is about an adventurer named Kyn who remembers some of his greatest memories and the choices he made in those adventurers that shaped what his life is like. You will explore many different kinds of areas each with there own unique design and experience. chose options that decide the fate of your companions and shape the world around you.
